settings.heading: How do I cook the dishes?​
settings.row_content: All HOMEBAKE 425°:30™ products cook for 30 minutes at 425°F​.

settings.heading: Do I leave the film on when I cook it?​
settings.row_content: Yes! Film should remain on the tray when it cooks in the oven. Remove film before serving.​

settings.heading: How should product be stored?​
settings.row_content: All HOMEBAKE 425°:30™ products should be stored in the freezer.

settings.heading: How many people does a tray serve?
settings.row_content: On average, each HOMEBAKE 425°:30™ has around 4 servings. You can find exact serving sizes for each product on the back of the packaging or on the product page.

settings.heading: What type of food is HOMEBAKE 425°:30™ ?​
settings.row_content: HOMEBAKE 425°:30™ dishes are delicious, quality meals your family will love- like homemade.

settings.text: Be the first one to know when we are open and get limited-time discounts!
